content.question: Under a flexible exchange-rate system, the Indian rupee will appreciate against the Japanese yen when

choices.label: India has a trade deficit with Japan
Japan’s economy enters a recession, but India’s does not
Japan’s money supply decreases while India’s money supply increases
real interest rates in India increase relative to those in Japan

content.answer: real interest rates in India increase relative to those in Japan
